## isValidDuration() function

### isValidDuration() function

isValidDuration returns true if the given string can be parsed into a valid Duration object, false otherwise

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function isValidDuration(durationString: string): boolean;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { isValidDuration } from '@grafana/data';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  durationString | <code>string</code> | string representation of a duration |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
